analysis.description:
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#29) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateTeams (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#176-214)

NBACrypto.ceoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#5-6)
NBACrypto.cfoAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#6-8)
NBACrypto.playersAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#30-32)
NBACrypto.teamsAreInitiated should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol#29)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0x01293cd77f68341635814c35299ed30ae212789e.sol:
